name: INCOMPLETE_NOTE_EPT
description: Table created for the visit narrative data stored in the patient masterfile. No longer used since we use UCN now since 2010, exporting these items as a formality.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: INC_NOTE_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID for an incomplete note, not used since 2010 and only exported as a formality.

columns.name: INC_NOTE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: INC_NOTE_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The note ID for an incomplete note, not used since 2010 and only exported as a formality.

columns.name: INC_NOTE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The note type for an incomplete note, not used since 2010 and only exported as a formality.
entries: Home Health Face to Face Attestation
Home Health Plan of Care Header

columns.name: INC_NOTE_MSG_ID
columns.description: The inbasket message ID for an incomplete note, not used since 2010 and only exported as a formality.

columns.name: INC_NOTE_START_DATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The start date for an incomplete note, not used since 2010 and only exported as a formality.

columns.name: INC_NOTE_LAST_EDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The end date for an incomplete note, not used since 2010 and only exported as a formality.
